Previous Next

netsquid.qubits.qreprutil

Definition of conversion methods between subclasses of QRepr.

netsquid.qubits.qreprutil.gslc2stab(GSLCRepr gslc_repr) → StabRepr

Create a stabilizer representation for this graphstate

Parameters:

gslc_repr (GSLCRepr) – Graph State to convert.

Returns:

StabRepr representation of the graph state.

Return type:

StabRepr

netsquid.qubits.qreprutil.stab2gslc(StabRepr stab_repr) → GSLCRepr

Create a gslc representation for this given stabilizer.

Parameters:

stab_repr (StabRepr) – StabRepr to convert.

Returns:

GSLC (Graph state with Local Cliffords) representation of the stabilizer state.

Return type:

GSLCRepr

netsquid.qubits.qreprutil.ket2stab(KetRepr ket_repr) → StabRepr

Convert a ket representation to a stabilizer representation.

Parameters:

ket_repr (KetRepr) – Ket state representation to convert.

Returns:

Stabilizer representation.

Return type:

StabRepr

Raises:

  • TypeError – If the ket vector is not a KetRepr.

  • ConversionError – If the ket representation is not a valid stabilizer representation.

Notes

Rounds the values of the ket state to 9 decimal places before attempting conversion.

netsquid.qubits.qreprutil.ket2gslc(KetRepr ket_repr) → GSLCRepr

Convert a ket representation to a GSLC representation.

Parameters:

ket_repr (KetRepr) – Ket state representation to convert.

Returns:

Graph states with local cliffords representation.

Return type:

GSLCRepr

Raises:

  • TypeError – If the ket representation is not a KetRepr.

  • ConversionError – If the ket representation is not a valid stabilizer representation.

Notes

Rounds the values of the ket state to 9 decimal places before attempting conversion.

netsquid.qubits.qreprutil.qrepr2sparsedm(QRepr qrepr) → SparseDMRepr

Convert any representation to a sparse DM representation via a dense density matrix.

Parameters:

qrepr (QRepr) – Quantum state representation to convert.

Returns:

Sparse density matrix representation.

Return type:

SparseDMRepr

netsquid.qubits.qreprutil.qrepr2dm(QRepr qrepr) → DenseDMRepr

Convert any representation to a dense DM representation.

Parameters:

qrepr (QRepr) – Quantum state representation to convert.

Returns:

Dense density matrix representation.

Return type:

DenseDMRepr

netsquid.qubits.qreprutil.gslc2ket(GSLCRepr gslc_repr) → KetRepr

Convert a GSLC representation to a ket representation.

Parameters:

gslc_repr (GSLCRepr) – The quantum state representation to convert.

Returns:

The ket vector representation.

Return type:

KetRepr

netsquid.qubits.qreprutil.qrepr2ket(QRepr qrepr) → KetRepr

Convert any representation to a Ket representation via a density matrix.

Performs random sampling if necessary.

Parameters:

qrepr (QRepr) – Quantum state representation to convert.

Returns:

Ket representation.

Return type:

KetRepr
